description: A classic, mega-sized coffee percolator for getting your camp crew up and at'em. Enameled steel is tough and has a speckled finish that resists chips and scratches. 3-litre volume means second cups are available for all.Enameled, 3-ply steel uses a kiln-hardened finish.Chip and scratch resistant.Non-sticking for easy cleaning.Includes aluminum insert for coffee grinds.
name: GSI Pioneer 12 Cup Percolator
